p: The Murashige and Skoog (MS) culture medium [ 30] was prepared using 3% ( w/ v) sucrose. In order to study organogenesis, 5 polyethylene glycol (PEG 6000) treatments, i.e., 0, 0.5, 1, 2, 4% were prepared. pH of medium was adjusted to 5.7–5.8, and 0.8% ( w/ v) plant agar was added. The sterilization of medium was performed using autoclave at the pressure of 1.06 kg cm −2 and temperature of 121 °C for 15 min.
